Congressional Reports: The Committee on Foreign Relations, to which was referred the Treaty Between the United States of America and the Republic of Korea on Mutual Legal Assistance in Criminal Matters, signed at Washington on November 23, 1993, together with a related exchange of notes signed on the same date, having considered the same, reports favorably thereon with two provisos and recommends that the Senate give its advice and consent to the ratification thereof as set forth in this report and the accompanying resolution of ratification.
